thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 31 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Unum Group Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.19

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unum Group Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.19
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Unum Group:
* REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 RESULTS * Q4 ADJUSTED OPERATING EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.13 EXCLUDING ITEMS
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.19 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.06 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SAYS BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017 WAS $43.02, COMPARED TO $39.02 AT DECEMBER 31, 2016
* SAYS EXPECTATION FOR AFTER-TAX ADJUSTED OPERATING INCOME GROWTH PER SHARE FOR FULL-YEAR 2018 REVISED TO BE WITHIN RANGE OF 17% - 23%
* QUARTERLY TOTAL REVENUE $2.84 BILLION VERSUS $2.8 BILLION
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $2.83 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
